#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#include<utility>
using namespace std;
std::vector<std::pair<long long int,long long int> >v;
long long int i,j,k,l,n,m,b,p,s=0,ew,a[200000],f=0,yt[200000][3];
int bin1(long long int x)
{
 	int low,high,mid;
 	low=0; high=n-1;
	while(low<high)
	{
		mid=low+(high-low)/2;
		if(a[mid]>=x)
			high=mid;
		else low=mid+1;
	}
	if(a[low]<x)
		return -1;
	else return low;
}
int bin2(long long int x)
{
    int low,high,mid;
	low=0; high=n-1;
	while(low<high)
	{
		mid=low+(high-low+1)/2;
		if(a[mid]<=x)
			low=mid;
		else
			high=mid-1;
	}
	if(a[low]>x)
		return -1;
	return low;
 }
int main() 
{
	scanf("%lld %lld",&n,&m);
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		scanf("%lld",&a[i]);
	}
	for(i=0;i<m;i++)
	{
		scanf("%lld %lld",&b,&p);
		v.push_back(make_pair(b,p));
	}
	sort(v.begin(),v.end());
	yt[0][0]=v[0].first;
	yt[0][1]=v[0].second;
	j=1;
	for(i=1;i<m;i++)
	{
		if(v[i].first<=yt[j-1][1])
		{
			yt[j-1][1]=max(yt[j-1][1],v[i].second);
		}
		else 
		{
			yt[j][0]=v[i].first;
			yt[j][1]=v[i].second;
			j++;
		}
	}
	sort(a,a+n);
	for(i=0;i<j;i++)
	{
		int a1=bin1(yt[i][0]);
		int a2=bin2(yt[i][1]);
		if(a1==-1||a2==-1)continue;
		if(a[a1]>yt[i][1]||a[a2]<yt[i][0])continue;
		else 
			s+=abs(a1-a2)+1;
	}
	printf("%lld",s);
	return 0;
}
